replies.body: Just wanna hop in here and say that regeneration hacks (or FastHeal) don't exist. Although they are *apparently* found in some client menus, pretty much any kind of no-cheat plugin ever should counteract this. Unless someone can supply proof that there is a viable regeneration or fast-heal hack that is able to bypass NoCheat's filter, I stand by what I said.
replies.body_tagged: Just wanna hop in here and say that regeneration hacks (or FastHeal) don't exist. Although they are *apparently* found in some client menus, pretty much any kind of no-cheat plugin ever should counteract this. Unless someone can supply proof that there is a viable regeneration or fast-heal hack that is able to bypass NoCheat's filter, I stand by what I said.

replies.body: We do have *a* version of No-Cheat. However, there are several hacked clients that are able to bypass even the most sophisticated anti-cheat plugins. Also, when the sensitivity was lowered in our version of no-cheat, I think it may have been lowered a tad bit too much.
replies.body_tagged: We do have *a* version of No-Cheat. However, there are several hacked clients that are able to bypass even the most sophisticated anti-cheat plugins. Also, when the sensitivity was lowered in our version of no-cheat, I think it may have been lowered a tad bit too much.
